name: BarSegment
summary: Represents a single run in a 1D barcode, expressed in module units.

parameters.name: isBar
parameters.summary: Whether the segment is a bar (dark) or a space (light).

parameters.name: modules
parameters.summary: Width of the segment in modules (must be > 0).

properties.name: IsBar
properties.summary: Gets whether the segment is a bar (dark) or a space (light).

properties.name: Modules
properties.summary: Gets the segment width in modules.
